price: Ɛna Yɛayε ͻsoro sε (efie) nkurusoͻ a yεwεn, nanso wͻdane wͻn ho fri emu nsεnkyerεnee no ho.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ سَقۡفٗا مَّحۡفُوظٗاۖ وَهُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā al-samāa saqfan maḥfūẓan wahum ʿan āyātihā muʿ'riḍūna
